task: Develop a basic 'Grim Fandango' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Imagine the music as a moving chain or caterpillar'.
name: Title: "Melody of the Underworld"

branding_data.short_description: Navigate the afterlife with musical puzzles in 'Melody of the Underworld', where music guides your journey.
branding_data.detailed_description: 'Melody of the Underworld' is an adventure game inspired by the classic 'Grim Fandango'. Set in a vibrant and mysterious afterlife, players assume the role of a soul navigating their way through a realm where music is a living, breathing entity. Each puzzle is intertwined with melodies that evolve like a moving chain or caterpillar, guiding players through challenges and uncovering secrets. The game combines narrative-driven exploration with unique musical mechanics, requiring players to listen, adapt, and solve puzzles by understanding the flow and rhythm of the music. With a captivating story and a beautifully haunting soundtrack, 'Melody of the Underworld' invites players to explore the afterlife in a way they've never experienced before.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
strategy: Imagine the music as a moving chain or caterpillar
